Package com.xmljson.converters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XMLJSONConverterI
    This interface provides methods that are required for creating a converter from XML to JSON.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConverterFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of XMLJSONConverterI.
    FileAccess
    Class containing file access methods
    JSONMethods
    Utilities Class contains methods for JSON reading and JSON to XML conversion.
    XMLJSONConverter
    Implements the XMLJSONConverterI Interface Used for converting JSON to XML
    XMLJSONConverterMain
    Main class for XMLJSONConverter
